description.plain: Roar is the project of Arizona-based musician Owen Evans. After the disbandment of his previous band Asleep In The Sea (for whom “Duck and Ape” was originally written before being reinterpreted as “Duck Or Ape”), Owens decided to take up the mantle of songwriting and producing alone. Eventually, in 2016, Evans became the touring drummer for fellow Arizona-based folk-punk band AJJ. This was the same year that he released his first full-length album as Roar, Impossible Animals.

body.plain: Roar is the project of Arizona-based musician Owen Evans. After the disbandment of his previous band Asleep In The Sea (for whom “Duck and Ape” was originally written before being reinterpreted as “Duck Or Ape”), Owens decided to take up the mantle of songwriting and producing alone. Eventually, in 2016, Evans became the touring drummer for fellow Arizona-based folk-punk band AJJ. This was the same year that he released his first full-length album as Roar, Impossible Animals.

songs.full_title: I Can't Handle Change by ROAR
songs.title: I Can’t Handle Change

description.plain: This song the more you listen to it, brings it back to a story of a person that is struggling to take in that not every little terrible thing that has happened to them or another person, is not their fault. They end up in places where they don’t want to like in a room where it is very tense and fumigated with toxic energy.

songs.full_title: I'm not feeling right? by EKKSTACY
songs.title: I’m not feeling right?

songs.lyrics:
78 ContributorsI Can’t Handle Change Lyrics[Intro]
Hangin' out where I don't belong
Is nothing new to me
I get tired and I get sick
And then I lose the strength to leave

[Pre-Chorus]
I can't handle change
I can't handle change

[Chorus]
Nothing I do is ever good
Nothing I do is ever good enough
Nothing I do is ever good
Nothing I do is ever good
Nothing I do is ever good enough
Nothing I do is ever good
[Bridge]
Leave me alone
Leave me alone
(I wanna go home now)
Leave me alone
Leave me alone
(I wanna go home now)

[Outro]
I can't help but repeat myself
"I know it's not your fault"
Still lately I begin to shake
For no reason at all
For no reason at all
For no reason at all
For no reason at all
For no reason at allYou might also like72Embed

songs.title: Christmas Kids

description.plain: Based on this interview with Roar, Christmas Kids is about the abusive relationship between Ronnie Spector of the Ronnettes and Phil Spector.

songs.embed_content: Read “Christmas Kids” by ROAR on Genius

album.name: I Can’t Handle Change

body.plain: Based on this interview with Roar, Christmas Kids is about the abusive relationship between Ronnie Spector of the Ronnettes and Phil Spector.

songs.lyrics:
45 ContributorsChristmas Kids Lyrics[Verse 1]
Ronnette, my dear, don't ever disappear
Do what you want as long as you stay here
I need you now, I love you so much
More than you could know

[Verse 2]
The Christmas kids were nothing but a gift
And love is a tower where all of us can live

[Pre-Chorus]
You'll change your name or change your mind
And leave this fucked up place behind
[Chorus]
But I'll know, I'll know
I'll know, I'll know
I'll know, I'll know
I'll know, I'll know

[Bridge]
Appearing unsightly
With devils inside me
If you ever try to leave me, I'll find you, Ronnie
If you ever try to leave me, I'll find you, Ronnie
If you ever try to leave me, I'll find you, Ronnie
If you ever try to leave me, I'll find you, Ronnie

[Verse 3]
I'm leaving, Phil, I'm leaving now
I'm going to escape, but you won't know how
Or where to find me when I'm gone
I'll drink myself to death inside
This prison cell
This prison cell

[Pre-Chorus]
So get me out of here
Get me out of here
Get me out of here
Get me out of here
You'll change your name or change your mind
And leave this fucked up place behind
[Chorus]
But I'll know, I'll know
I'll know, I'll know
I'll know, I'll know
I'll know, I'll knowYou might also like21Embed

songs.lyrics:
18 ContributorsHeart-For-Brains Lyrics[Verse 1]
Heart for brains, you should have known
Take a seat with the weak
But stand up for me, stand up for me
Mercilessly slaughtering
When the sick feed the strong
The pack marches on
The pack marches on

[Chorus]
Life's hard when you're soft
You've got our love
Life's hard when you're soft
You've got our love
[Verse 2]
Shit for brains, you're living proof
That it pays to be hard on those around you
But the wolves who guard their wounds
Hide their limps, and their health are all eaten too
They're all eaten too

[Chorus]
Life's hard when you're soft
You've got our love
Life's hard when you're soft
You've got our love
Life's hard when you're soft
You've got our love
Life's hard when you're soft
You've got our love
Life's hard when you're soft
You've got our loveYou might also like15Embed
